fields.description:
Hi, All, I updated our developer confluence from 3.5.17 to 4.0 and reindexing it. And updated UPM from 2.1 to 2.13. Now it doesn't appear any pictures and other on '/plugins/servlet/upm/marketplace' page and writes error: 'license requires the application license type to be: "COMMERCIAL" - however it is actually "DEVELOPER".
 -- url: /rest/licensing/1.0/notice'  But I have changed confluence license on 'developer'
fields.summary: UPM doesn't appears market after update

fields.description:
When creating a macro to have a custom formatted panel like the following: 

## @param Title:title=Title|type=string|desc=Title  

<ac:macro ac:name="panel">        
<ac:parameter ac:name="titleBGColor">#ccc</ac:parameter>        <ac:parameter ac:name="borderStyle">solid</ac:parameter>        <ac:parameter ac:name="borderColor">#6699CC</ac:parameter>        <ac:parameter ac:name="borderWidth">2</ac:parameter>        <ac:parameter ac:name="titleColor">#000000</ac:parameter>    <ac:parameter ac:name="title">$!paramTitle</ac:parameter>    
<ac:rich-text-body>$body</ac:rich-text-body>
</ac:macro> 

A headline that is entered in the body, is not displayed on the page, only the text formated as paragraph is displayed.
fields.summary: Panel Macro swallows Headings

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31088].
  {panel}

h3. Step to Reproduce
# Go to a Confluence page.
# Click Tools >> Attachment 
# Click {{Choose File}} button
# Attach file with the name 'İ ' ( use the İ.txt attached in this ticket)
# The following error will appear in the browser and the atlassian-confluence.log file.
{code}
java.lang.NullPointerException
at com.atlassian.confluence.pages.actions.beans.AttachmentStorer.attachFiles(AttachmentStorer.java:64)
Stack Trace:[hide]

java.lang.NullPointerException
at com.atlassian.confluence.pages.actions.beans.AttachmentStorer.attachFiles(AttachmentStorer.java:64)
at com.atlassian.confluence.pages.actions.AbstractViewAttachmentsAction.execute(AbstractViewAttachmentsAction.java:104)
at com.opensymphony.xwork.DefaultActionInvocation.invoke(DefaultActionInvocation.java:168)
at com.opensymphony.xwork.interceptor.AroundInterceptor.intercept(AroundInterceptor.java:35)
at com.opensymphony.xwork.DefaultActionInvocation.invoke(DefaultActionInvocation.java:165)
at 
{code}

h3. *Workaround*
(i) Applicable for other non-latin languages except for {{İ}} Turkish character
# Ensure your database collation settings are able to handle international strings. 
Refer to this [comment for a PostgreSQL fix|https://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-31088?focusedCommentId=852007&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels%3Acomment-tabpanel#comment-852007]
# Refer to this [link for more information|https://confluence.atlassian.com/doc/configuring-database-character-encoding-177698.html#ConfiguringDatabaseCharacterEncoding-ForPostgreSQLrunningunderLinux]
fields.summary: java.lang.NullPointerException when try to attach file with non-Latin characters

fields.description:
*To reproduce:*
1. Open a confluence instance in Firefox.
2. Create a space with key "TEST".
3. Create a page in that space called "<script>alert(0)</script>".
4. Create two pages with the page from step 3 as their parent.
5. Go to:
{code:none}
[base path]/panels/reorderpage.action?panelName=reorder&spaceKey=TEST&title=%3Cscript%3Ealert%280%29%3C/script%3E&movedPageId=0&pageTitle=
{code}
An alert should open. The strings in steps 2 and 3 are only important in that they need to match the URL (any space or XSS string can be used).

See [reorder-page.vm, line 10|https://stash.atlassian.com/projects/CONF/repos/confluence/browse/confluence-core/confluence-webapp/src/main/webapp/pages/panels/reorder-page.vm?until=cb9f7bac0d77b8777132d704f0a959b35c07723e#10].
fields.summary: XSS in reorder panel

fields.description:
*To reproduce:*
1. Run the following command, replacing {{\[PAGE_URL]}} with the URL of a new page and {{\[USERNAME]}} and {{\[PASSWORD]}} with your credentials (if anonymous access is not enabled):
{code:none}
curl '[PAGE_URL]' -H 'Referer: https://example.com/x"><iframe/onload=alert(0)>xx' -u '[USERNAME]:[PASSWORD]' -si
{code}
2. Repeat step 1 a few times. Five should be more than enough, but more are needed for non-new pages with existing "Hot Referrers".
3. Go to the page information for the target page. An alert should be displayed. (To do this, open the page you targeted in the browser, click *Tools*, click *Page Information*)

See [viewinfo.vm, line 272|https://stash.atlassian.com/projects/CONF/repos/confluence/browse/confluence-core/confluence-webapp/src/main/webapp/pages/viewinfo.vm?until=bbb2430bc7fc2401ec6c97d1813407b2eb596ebe#272].
fields.summary: XSS in Hot Referrers
Page pauses while loading in Chrome
API for Page Properties Report macro
Provide option to hide or minimize formatting macros like Table Plus in change notification emails.

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31079].
  {panel}

Seems to be an regression of CONF-10619.

1. Create a page,
2. Put some headings in
3. Put a table of contents macro in
4. Open the macro browser and preview 
- You see nothing 

The only way to refresh the macro preview and make it work is to "preview" the page OR to save the page and come back and edit it again.

This makes you feel like the macro is broken quite often and don't use it.
fields.summary: Table of contents macro preview doesn't really work until you save or preview a page.

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31075].
  {panel}

*Feature Request Background*

Confluence User Profile macro will display all the provided information of the user without any border to separate each users. When there are multiple user that does not has all of the information, it will look not uniform as could be seen here:

!userprofile.png|thumbnail!

If we could add expendable feature into user profile macro, it will keep it uniformed and those information could be pulled if the user need it to be.

fields.description:

This behaviour only happens, if the Keyboard Shortcuts Plugin (com.atlassian.plugins.shortcuts.atlassian-shortcuts-plugin) is disabled.

fields.description:
Submitted data in multi line template fields will get lost when using the back function in the browser. Single line data works normal.

*Steps to recreate*
# Create a new template
# Create a table with 3 variables
# Set the following three properties: First variable is simple, Second as Multi Line, Third as List
# Save the template
# Create a new page using your new template
# Enter values for each box (make sure you select an option other than the first one for the dropdown box)
# Click Next
# Click the browser back button
# Edit data
# Click next

*Result*
After using the browser back button, the previously submitted data shows in the template as expected. After pressing next to go back into the Edit Mode, multi line sections that did not have their data in the previous screen, will show up empty.
*Expected Result*
All data in the template screen gets taken over.
fields.summary: Template variable values are lost betweenTemplate and Edit Mode

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31065].
  {panel}

When viewing a secure site over SSL, most browsers default behavior blocks or prompts with a warning any linked non-SSL content. The "What's New" iframe can be configured via help-paths.properties to load from https://docs.atlassian.com/ instead of http://docs.atlassian.com/ in an attempt to avoid this. However, that doesn't achieve much since the "What's New" destination page then does a redirect to non-SSL page located under http://www.atlassian.com/ which then attempts to redirect to https://www.atlassian.com/

Because the insecure redirect is blocked, the user gets an empty white box for the "What's New" feature or if they are lucky an error message saying the content couldn't be loaded. Some browsers will prompt the user asking if they would like to permit mixed content, others will not.

It seems clear to me that the redirect setup from https://docs.atlassian.com/ should go straight to the secure https://www.atlassian.com/ site since that's where the content is ultimately hosted anyway.

I don't want to host Confluence help locally and I'm not even sure that would include "What's New" notices anyway. The only feasible workaround I could come up with was to disable "What's New" notices, which is rather unfortunate.

To reproduce, visit the first URL and inspect the HTTP requests with Tamper Data or Fiddler:
https://docs.atlassian.com/confluence/docs-52/whatsnew/iframe
http://www.atlassian.com/en/software/confluence/whats-new-iframe/52
https://www.atlassian.com/en/software/confluence/whats-new-iframe/52
fields.summary: "What's New" inconsistent user experience across browsers on SSL wiki site

fields.description:
A super user created a new group in confluence called "product_planning_and_release_manager" and provided it with privilege of confluence_administrator and assigned my user id to it. I re-logged in and I attempted to go to space tools > content tools > but I don't see templates there unlike my super user. 

Later, the super user assigned my user id to the actualy Confluence_adminstrator group and it didn't make a difference either.

Please note I can create/manage GLOBAL templates but not able to mange space blueprints OR space permissions.
fields.summary: Custom group with Confluence_Administrator role enabled does not allow Blueprint management

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31060].
  {panel}

If you have an existing JIRA OnDemand instance with existing users and you add Confluence OnDemand:

1. Users will not be populated in the people directory
2. Users cannot be @mentioned  

Looks like in both cases, the user will be populated in the people directory and they can be mentioned once the said user authenticates. 

Note: If it helps, Confluence was provisioned about 4 hours before the issue was presented to support. 

We tried manually syncing crowd but it had no effect.
fields.summary: Users Not Populated in People Directory After Adding Confluence OnDemand to Existing JIRA OnDemand

fields.description:
I migrated from 3.5.16 to 4.3.7 and encountered an exception on all pages that make use of a macro: live-template, the macro that creates automatically a table of contents for all pages that link from a parent page. 
An error message is displayed in lieu of the TOC. The rest of the page seems to be rendered ok.

The full error message is:

Error formatting macro: live-template: java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: com.atlassian.confluence.pages.templates.PageTemplate.getLabels()Ljava/lang/String;
fields.summary: macro live-template throws exception after migration to 4.3.7

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31056].
  {panel}

I was trying to test the wikidsmart plugin on our confluence test installation.

The first issue was that the importet wikidsmart spaces were not visible in the space list either on the dashboard or the space list macro. 

After trying to reinstall the wikidsmart plugin I now have the situation that no spaces are listed when viewing the space directory, but they are still listed on the space list widget on the dashboard.

When I click on the wikidsmart space(s) in the space administration section   I get a 404. The other spaces that are not visible in the space directory show up in the space admin section and the permissions can be changed normally.
fields.summary: Spaces are not shown in Space list

{noformat}The query could not be parsed{noformat}

fields.description:
*Steps to Reproduce*
# Create JIRA user directory in Confluence, and set permissions of that directory to Read/Write
# Make sure the Confluence Internal Directory is top priority in Confluence Admin > User Directories
# Create a group
# After creating the group, run query in the Confluence database:
{code:sql}SELECT * FROM cwd_group WHERE group_name = '<groupname>';{code}
(Replace <groupname> with the name of the group you just created)
# You will notice 2 groups have been created, 1 for JIRA directory and 1 for internal directory

Creates issues if JIRA directory does not allow write operations to it.

*Workaround*
# Set directory permission for JIRA directory to Read Only
fields.summary: Confluence Creates Duplicate Groups Internally and in Jira

fields.description:
In either a comment or the editor, if you type _\{quote\}_, a new quote block is created.

The cursor jumps to the next line and in Firefox, you cannot go back to the quote block, so you cannot introduce text.

If you do the same in Chrome, you can go into the quote block and add the text., but when you press _ENTER_, a new quote block is created, when the expected behaviour would be to add a new line in the same quote block.
fields.summary: typing {quote} to create a quote block does not work as expected

  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31040].
  {panel}

The "Draft Confirmation" dialog is shown when clicking the Close link from the page editor. If I click the "Discard changes" or "Save to my drafts" labels then the corresponding radio button should be activated.

This can be done by moving the {{<input/>}} element inside the {{<label/>}} element, or by adding a {{for="input-id"}} attribute to the label.

fields.description:
* Create a space
* Grant 'view' access to another user
* The user should *not* be given any admin rights

You see the text:

{noformat}You do not have permission to access the personal space: Mark Hrynczak [Atlassian].
Mark Hrynczak [Atlassian] has not made their space public.{noformat}

This is incorrect - the space *is* public, but the user is not an admin.


Confluence version = 5.3

fields.description:
After update Confluence Mobile Plugin to v5.2, anonymous access are not possible anymore.

h4. Steps to Reproduce

# Update Confluence Mobile Plugin in UPM to v5.2
# Granted anonymous access in Global Permission and Test Space
# Set Site Homepage to Test Space in General Configuration
# Access to Confluence with iPad safari

h4. Expected Result

Anonymous redirected to the site homepage which granted anonymous access

h4. Actual Result

* In the iDevice, a banner with following message was thrown:
{code}
Oops! Something went wrong. It's probably us, but it might be you. Check your network connection.
{code}

* Screenshot:

!safari_mobile.PNG|thumbnail!

* In the atlassian-confluence.log:
{code}
2013-10-03 01:07:36,807 ERROR [http-8714-5] [common.error.jersey.ThrowableExceptionMapper] toResponse Uncaught exception thrown by REST service
 -- referer: http://192.168.0.108:8714/plugins/servlet/mobile | url: /rest/mobile/1.0/content/524293 | userName: anonymous
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at com.atlassian.confluence.mail.notification.persistence.dao.hibernate.HibernateNotificationDao.findNotificationByUserAndPage(HibernateNotificationDao.java:72)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.mail.notification.DefaultNotificationManager.getNotificationByUserAndPage(DefaultNotificationManager.java:47)
	at sun.reflect.GeneratedMethodAccessor596.invoke(Unknown Source)
	at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:25)
	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:597)
	at org.springframework.aop.support.AopUtils.invokeJoinpointUsingReflection(AopUtils.java:307)
	at org.springframework.aop.framework.ReflectiveMethodInvocation.invokeJoinpoint(ReflectiveMethodInvocation.java:182)
	at org.springframework.aop.framework.ReflectiveMethodInvocation.proceed(ReflectiveMethodInvocation.java:149)
{code}
fields.summary: Confluence Mobile Plugin v5.2 breaks when access Spaces with anonymous access.

fields.description:
Adding new Meeting Notes or File Lists using the respective blueprints will create new pages under the space root. 

Previously these pages would be created under the hierarchy of the Meeting Notes and File Lists pages as subpages, which would be the correct way of handling them.

Steps to reproduce:

* Hit "c" on the keyboard and select either the "Meeting Notes" or "File List" Blueprint.
* Save the new page
* Check Space Tools -> Content Tools -> Reorder Pages: the new page will be displayed under the space root.

Above was reproducable with both our Confluence production installation (5.2.3) as well as a completely new Confluence trial installation using the currently availblle 5.3 download and using the demonstration space.
fields.summary: Using Meeting Notes and File List Blueprints creates new pages under Space root

fields.description:
We recently upgraded Confluence from 4.3 to 5.2.5.

One of the problems we encountered was that some JIRA Macros fail to display with the message 'Unable to render JIRA issues macro, execution error.', while others are fine. There appears to be no rhyme or reason for why some are broken and others are not.

In the editor if you edit the macro it still displays the correct corresponding ticket id, such as :
"key = TEST-111"

However, unlike with the macros which upgraded correctly, there's no search result shown below. We can fix these individually by hitting search again which appears to recreate the link, however we use these on a LOT of pages including historical content which is now broken.
fields.summary: After upgrading, some JIRA macros display 'Unable to render JIRA issues macro, execution error.' despite being correctly configured

fields.summary: Export to PDF cuts off bottom of task list boxes

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
*NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31026].
{panel}
{panel:title=Atlassian Status as of 12 October 2016|borderStyle=solid|borderColor=#3c78b5|titleBGColor=#3c78b5|bgColor=#e7f4fa}
h4. What had caused this issue?

The [JIRA Issues Macro|https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/DOC/JIRA+Issues+Macro] is used to create links to JIRA issues in Confluence pages. These links contain the identification of which JIRA instance the JIRA Issue Macro then will be referring to.
This issue occurred as Confluence A and Confluence B do not have the same Application Links configured. 
JIRA Issue Macros' in Confluence B (imported from Confluence A via Space backup) aren't able to render the issues correctly as it is still referring to JIRA instance configured in Confluence A, in which is not configured in Confluence B.
h4. Resolution for Cloud instances

The Confluence Cloud importer has been updated to provide a *_JIRA macro repair_* feature, in which any broken JIRA macros will be fixed as part of the import.
For more details on this, please refer to our [Import the space content into Confluence Cloud|https://confluence.atlassian.com/confcloud/import-a-confluence-space-724765531.html#ImportaConfluenceSpace-Step3.ImportthespacecontentintoConfluenceCloud] document.
h4. Workaround for Server instances

If you're using Confluence Server and you've recently changed domain name, migrated from Confluence Cloud, or merged multiple instances, you may need to relink JIRA issues macros.
For a workaround of this issue, please refer to the steps outlined in our [How to bulk update JIRA Issue Macro to point to a different JIRA instance|https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/CONFKB/How+to+bulk+update+JIRA+Issue+Macro+to+point+to+a+different+JIRA+instance]
{panel}
h3. Summary

Creating a backup of your Confluence Cloud Space to import into another Confluence Cloud instance affects JIRA issue macro with the warning:
{noformat}
"Unable to locate JIRA server for this macro. It may be due to Application Link configuration."
{noformat}
h3. Steps to Reproduce

[Export Space XML backup|https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/ConfCloud/Export+Content+to+Word%2C+PDF%2C+HTML+and+XML#ExportContenttoWord,PDF,HTMLandXML-ExporttoHTML,XML,orPDF] from Confluence A.
 [Import the generated XML backup|https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/ConfCloud/Import+a+Confluence+Space] to Confluence B.
h3. Expected Results

Contents of the imported Space (JIRA Issue Macro in particular) are rendered successfully.
h3. Actual Results

JIRA Issue Macros that exist in the imported space's pages are not rendered. Instead, the following warnings are shown:
{noformat}
"Unable to locate JIRA server for this macro. It may be due to Application Link configuration."
{noformat}
fields.summary: Confluence Space Export/Import Affects JIRA Issue Macro Links

fields.description: Pie Chart On Confluence Page constantly showing the "Progress Bar"
fields.summary: Pie Chart On Confluence Page constantly showing the "Progress Bar"
Need to be able to right-justify groups of cells in a table

fields.description:
When importing a filename with a nonbreaking space character, Confluence has unexpected results. 
Sometimes drag and drop will work, but when it does it replaces the nonbreaking space character with an "A" character with an accent (another special character). 

Sometimes the Browse -> Select File method works, and will create a name without special "A" characters as described above. However, these attachments are not able to be edited or removed. 

Each of the above steps were done by trying to import an attachment from the client disk to the confluence client, using the Tools->Attachments page. 

I have attached a document with a nonbreaking space between the "TTPRR_ " and "IRS" words. The contents of the document are meaningless. This attachment, named as is, creates problems on our instance of confluence.
fields.summary: Nonbreaking Space Character in Attachment name breaks attachment removal/editing.

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31021].
  {panel}

When using the Site Importer tool in the latest Confluence OnDemand release (*5.3-OD-7*), all content ownership is set to 'Anonymous'. This can be reproduced when importing a full backup from a standalone Confluence (tested with 5.2.5). Looking into the database, we can see that "creator" and "lastmodifier" are *null* for any imported page.

h4. Steps to reproduce
# Create a backup from a Confluence v.5.2.5 (or use the backup attached)
# Import that backup via *Import Site* menu in a Confluence 5.3-OD-7

h4. Expected results
Page/Blog creators or modifiers are correctly displayed

h4. Actual results
Page/Blog creators or modifiers are shown as *anonymous*
fields.summary: Site Import causes users to show as Anonymous in metadata

fields.description:
We recently upgraded the plugins in Confluence that were marked as Upgrade Available when logged in as an administrator on the 'Manage Add-ons' page.
The plugins reported an error when installing (Support Zip attached).
Since then we are unable to add macros to wiki pages. An error is displayed (attached screenshot).
Please could you help us identify how to resolve the issues and get Confluence back to a working state.
fields.summary: Since upgrade of plugins, Error message is displayed when trying to add a macro to a wiki page

fields.description:
If you try to include a page with an "/" in the title into another page, there will be an "unable to render {include}" macro error. 

I guess this issue could be a problem in a wide range of macros.
fields.summary: "Include Page Macro" does not allow slashes in "Page to Include" field

fields.description:
To reproduce:

# Open Confluence editor.
# On the first line write 'ItemA'
# Shift+Return to go to a new line.
# On the new line write 'ItemB'
# Drag select both.
# But them in a list.

> There's a space between them! if you take them out of the list, it keeps the space it added. I would expect these items to be added in to a single contiguous list, and I'm sure that's what happened on previous versions of Confluence (upgraded from 4.3 recently).
fields.summary: Making lines in to a bullet/numbered list adds a space between them

fields.description:
To reproduce:

1. Open the attached word doc.
2. Copy the contents.
3. Paste it in to Confluence.

> The separate lists have been combined in to one.

I've attached screenshots to demonstrate the problem, this is incredibly annoying when trying to bring it large amounts of content.
fields.summary: Pasting content from Word containing multiple headings concatenates all list entries in to a single list

fields.description:
The doconfiguretheme action allows for configuration of the Documentation theme for Confluence. This action is defined in two namespaces, one of which is accessible by any user of Confluence (including anonymous users, if anonymous use of Confluence is allowed). If this action is executed with no space specified, it is applied to all spaces that have not already configured the Documentation theme without any access checks.

The doconfiguretheme action can be accessed by a user using the form at: 

/spaces/doctheme/configuretheme.action?key=spacekey

If the "key" parameter is removed, the submitted form will demonstrate the vulnerability.
fields.summary: Doconfiguretheme action accessible to non-administrative users

fields.description:
Confluence allows an administrator to configure the groups which will not be allowed for member listing by the userlister macro. The doconfigure action that implements this functionality is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery (XSRF). An attacker who exploited this vulnerability could cause the group black-list to be cleared.

A GET request to the following location (as an elevated administrator) is enough to invoke this action: 

/admin/userlister/doconfigure.action?blackListEntries=confluence-administrators&save=Save

If the blackListEntries parameter value is removed, the user lister group black list is removed completely.
fields.summary: User lister action has no cross-site request forgery (XSRF) protection

fields.description:
The Share Page API exposes a REST endpoint that is available to authenticated users of Confluence. It is possible for any user to share any page simply by specifying the corresponding numeric id and the resulting notification includes the title of the shared page. In particular, a user may obtain the title of any page in a Confluence instance, including those to which they have no access, simply by iterating over all possible identifiers. Although the content of pages is not available in the notification, this still represents a moderately serious information leak.

The following POST request was made whilst authenticated to a Confluence instance as user “phill”: 

POST /rest/share-page/latest/share HTTP/1.1 Host: confluenceserver:8090 User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:21.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/21.0 Accept: text/plain, */*; q=0.01 Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.5 Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8 X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequest Referer: http://192.168.79.130:8090/display/ds/2013/09/18/another+blog+post Content-Length: 82 Cookie: confluence-sidebar.width=285; AJS.conglomerate.cookie="|streams.view.2147942400=full-view"; confluence.browse.space.cookie=space-blogposts; JSESSIONID=EF049B1CFBDE8A8B36252AC9D18ED8FC; mywork.tab.tasks=false Connection: keep-alive Pragma: no-cache Cache-Control: no-cache {"users":["phill"],"emails":[],"groups":[],"note":"","entityId":"524789"}

The entityId value represents a page in a space that is inaccessible to the user “phill”. The resulting notification to the user "phill" includes the title of the inaccessible page.
fields.summary: Inaccessible page titles leaked by Share Page API

fields.description:
The dosearchsite action is vulnerable to reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) via the searchQuery.spaceKey parameter. This vulnerability appears to be very similar to issue CONF-30318 and fixes implemented in response to that issue may fix this vulnerability.

If the URL below is visited by an authenticated user of Confluence, the embedded script executes in the context of the user:

http://confluenceserver:8090/dosearchsite.action?searchQuery.queryString=test&searchQuery.spaceKey=%3Cscript%3Ealert%28document.cookie%29%3B%3C%2Fscript%3E

It should be noted that this is a non-trivial example of XSS - the page returned from this URL contains the embedded script, html encoded, as the value of an input tag in a div of class "filter-wrapper space-filter". XSS is triggered when this div is processed by javascript associated with the page.
fields.summary: Reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) in dosearchsite action

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31010].
  {panel}

Update - Archiving plugin can be used for Standalone Confluecne, but there is no way to archive individual pages in OnDemand without moving them to an archived space.

Hi,

In our organisation we store information on pages by season (Spring Summer 14 ; Autumn Winter 14 etc)...Eventually we will need to archive these pages.

I was thinking of creating a space called 'Archive'. How can I move the pages and their contents there?

Thanks
Amel
fields.summary: Add ability to Archive individual Pages

fields.description:
I have the same problem as here https://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONF-30469?jql=project%20%3D%20CONF%20and%20%28affectedVersion%20%3D%20%225.2%22%20or%20affectedVersion%3D%20%225.2.3%22%29

But i update from 5.1.5 to 5.2.5 and I don't have permission to see a bug Can I get help?
fields.summary: no visible macros except "External Content" after update

fields.description:
The RSS feed macro currently appears to be enabled by default in Confluence. This is contrary to the information contained in the following Confluence documentation:

https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/DOC/RSS+Feed+Macro

While a whitelist is enforced by default, as confluence implicitly trusts itself it is possible to exploit this issue through an attached rss file.

Steps to reproduce:
1. create a new page
2. attach the CONF-31007.xml file to the new page
3. on the new page add a rss macro with a RSS Feed URL pointing to the ^CONF-31007.xml  attachment and then add &os_username=$ATTACK_USERNAME&os_password=$ATTACK_PASSWORD to the end of the url to make confluence authorize against itself so it is able to access the attachment.
The resulting url should look something like the following:
e.g. http://$confluence/download/attachments/557071/simple.xml?api=v2&os_username=myuser&os_password=myuser
4. Save the page.
5. Observe two alert prompts with the numbers 1 and 2 in them.
fields.summary: RSS Macro should not trust all content from the origin server by default.

fields.description:
A number of renderer classes used by the widget macro were previously identified that contained URL validation flaws leading to persistent cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities.

The modified classes now make use of the isUrlMatch method from the WidgetConnectorUtil class in the implementation of the matches method required by the WidgetRenderer interface. Internally, isUrlMatch constructs a standard Java URL object and testing indicates that this throws a MalformedURLException when provided with a maliciously constructed URL that could lead to XSS.

The DailyMotionRenderer class does not currently make use of the isUrlMatch method and simply uses the contains method from the String class to check for a matching URL. Furthermore, the final URL returned by the getEmbedUrl method (passed directly to velocityRenderService.render to create the HTML returned to the client) simply replaces a substring of the untrusted input parameter, allowing a malicious URL scheme at the start of the URL to remain intact.

The following value for the "Web Site's Widget URL" parameter of the widget macro demonstrates XSS:

javascript:document.write(document.cookie);//#dailymotion.com

Note that in testing this value could not be successfully set via the GUI macro editor and was instead entered using the standard macro markup language as follows:

{widget:url= javascript:document.write(document.cookie);//#dailymotion.com}
fields.summary: Persistent cross-site scripting (XSS) via DailyMotionRenderer
Bump widget-connector to 2.2.0
Add possibility to change columns order in 5.1.x

fields.description:
h1. Steps to reproduce
# create a table with about 12 columns and fill them up with pictures and ipsum
# edit the far right hand section of the page page as User A but don't save
# edit the same node of content as User B and save
# save the page as User A

This will trigger the merge conflict page. The diffs section of the screen will be disabled so User A will not be able to see what kind of changes User B made.
In addition, and, more seriously, User A is trapped because they cannot reach the save or cancel buttons. The "Esc" and Ctrl+Alt+S shortcuts will not work.

Issue reproduced in Chrome and Firefox
fields.summary: merge conflict page is unusable for wide content
Bump bundled TOC plugin to 2.6.9

fields.description:
In Confluence 5.2, a new table called user_mapping was added to the Confluence schema. This means that the instructions in this KB article are no longer complete and need to be updated:
https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/DOC/Restoring+Passwords+To+Recover+Admin+User+Rights
fields.summary: Need to update the 'Restore Passwords' KB

fields.description:
This is a new install of Confluence and then we copied the database from production to the new instance.   

Also followed the knowledge base article to  delete confversion number from the database and we are still getting the same error.

Thanks.
fields.summary: Confluence will not start up because the build number in the home directory [4249] doesn't match the build number in the database [4394]
Code macro does not allow nested macros

fields.description:
If you create a page with tasks assigned to someone, it will add entries into their "Open Notifications" task list area, and those notifications have links to allow you to open the page/tasks.  

If you change the URL of your Confluence instance (which we did via export/import), old tasks have the old URL embedded in them so when you click them, they do not work.

See screenshot of a task created for me months ago, and since then we migrated to a new instance/URL.
fields.summary: Personal Task URLs incorrect if wiki URL changes

fields.description:
This past weekend I attempted to upgrade from 5.1.3 to 5.2.5. This upgrade failed when it failed to find  a table name user_mapping table.

{noformat}
2013-09-28 16:00:33,300 ERROR [TP-Processor3] [sf.hibernate.util.JDBCExceptionReporter] logExceptions Table 'confluence.user_mapping' doesn't exist
2013-09-28 16:00:33,303 ERROR [TP-Processor3] [sf.hibernate.util.JDBCExceptionReporter] logExceptions Table 'confluence.user_mapping' doesn't exist
2013-09-28 16:00:33,307 ERROR [TP-Processor3] [[Catalina].[localhost].[/confluence].[noop]] log Servlet.service() for servlet noop threw exception
org.springframework.jdbc.BadSqlGrammarException: Hibernate operation: Could not execute query; bad SQL grammar []; nested exception is com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.MySQLSyntaxErrorException: Table 'confluence.user_mapping' doesn't exist
        at org.springframework.jdbc.support.SQLStateSQLExceptionTranslator.doTranslate(SQLStateSQLExceptionTranslator.java:97)
        at org.springframework.jdbc.support.AbstractFallbackSQLExceptionTranslator.translate(AbstractFallbackSQLExceptionTranslator.java:72)
        at org.springframework.orm.hibernate.HibernateAccessor.convertJdbcAccessException(HibernateAccessor.java:364)
        at org.springframework.orm.hibernate.HibernateAccessor.convertHibernateAccessException(HibernateAccessor.java:351)
        at org.springframework.orm.hibernate.HibernateTemplate.execute(HibernateTemplate.java:375)
        at org.springframework.orm.hibernate.HibernateTemplate.execute(HibernateTemplate.java:337)
        at com.atlassian.confluence.user.persistence.dao.hibernate.HibernateConfluenceUserDao.findByUsername(HibernateConfluenceUserDao.java:79)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
{noformat}

After a lot of banging my head on my desk I instead attempted to upgrade to 5.2.3 which succeeded.

I infer from this that the 5.2.5 upgrade is missing the logic to create this necessary table, or that you can't upgrade to 5.2.5 directly and have to upgrade to 5.2.3 first. If it's the latter, this should be documented.
fields.summary: Upgrade from 5.1.3 to 5.2.5 Fails Because user_mapping Table is Not Created

fields.description:
After upgrading a 5.1.4 to latest 5.2.5, the installation's schema upgrade fails due following upgrade step and therefor all following queries. The complete application only prints out a standard Tomcat error page.

I have set the priority to Major, but actually the application is not usable with 5.2.5 (perhaps since 5.2?) under some circumstances of data?

{code}

013-09-30 13:58:59,819 INFO [main] [springframework.web.context.ContextLoader] initWebApplicationContext Root WebApplicationContext: initialization completed in 19535 ms
2013-09-30 13:59:01,786 INFO [main] [confluence.upgrade.upgradetask.LoginInfoDuplicateEntryRemovalUpgradeTask] doUpgrade No duplicate logininfo rows found. No action necessary.
2013-09-30 13:59:02,080 INFO [main] [atlassian.confluence.upgrade.UpgradeTask] doUpgrade Finding rows with mixed case username references in LINKS table
2013-09-30 13:59:02,124 INFO [main] [atlassian.confluence.upgrade.UpgradeTask] doUpgrade Finding rows with mixed case username references in TRACKBACKLINKS table
2013-09-30 13:59:02,126 INFO [main] [atlassian.confluence.upgrade.UpgradeTask] doUpgrade Finding rows with mixed case username references in FOLLOW_CONNECTIONS table
2013-09-30 13:59:02,148 ERROR [main] [atlassian.confluence.upgrade.UpgradeLauncherServletContextListener] contextInitialized Upgrade failed, application will not start: Upgrade task com.atlassian.confluence.upgrade.upgradetask.LowerCaseUsernameReferencesUpgradeTask@409f3aab failed during the SCHEMA_UPGRADE phase due to: Table 'LABEL' has more than one primary key
com.atlassian.confluence.upgrade.UpgradeException: Upgrade task com.atlassian.confluence.upgrade.upgradetask.LowerCaseUsernameReferencesUpgradeTask@409f3aab failed during the SCHEMA_UPGRADE phase due to: Table 'LABEL' has more than one primary key

{code}

I would suggest it lools like a similar one like CONF-30380 which was MySQL only.

fields.description:
Tested in 5.1.2 and 5.2.5 using IE8 and IE9 throws a "Page Not Found" error when pasting in page, PROVIDED THAT "Allow Programmatic Clipboard Access" in IE security settings is DISABLED.  

[CSP-109878|https://support.atlassian.com/browse/CSP-109878] mentions that it previously worked in 3.4.9 with this option disabled.   His security department does not wish to enable this option in IE.
fields.summary: Pasting in IE8/IE9 Throws Page Not Found Error
A macro that displays all permissions on a page

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-30991].
  {panel}

Currently, a regular user can only see the page specific permissions of a page, and can't see space restrictions at all.

It would be good for them to be able to easily and quickly check what their page looks like to either an anonymous user, or a specific user. This will allow users who aren't familiar with how permissions work in Confluence to quickly and easily verify if their page is secure, which is all they really want.

This would also be a good way for admins to make sure if their whole instance is displaying to a certain user as they expect it should.

[Facebook has this feature|https://www.facebook.com/help/288066747875915], for reference.
fields.summary: How does my page/space/instance look to other people?

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-30990].
  {panel}

Currently, the STP is included with Confluence-only OnDemand, which enables customer admins to submit support requests directly from the application. This is undesirable because:
- it bypasses the usual issue creation process in SAC (which can notify customers about ongoing incidents that affect them before they contact us),
- it puts the issue into the wrong SAC project (delaying our response time),
- it doesn't include logs, because of the way things are set up in OnDemand.

The STP isn't present with JIRA+Confluence OD. It should be the same for Confluence-only OD.
fields.summary: Support Tools Plugin should not be allowed to create issues from Confluence OnDemand

fields.description:
h4. Symptoms

Every time a page containing a chart macro with the options to save an attachment on, it will save a new version of the chart into the attachment. When the "new" option is selected for versioning, this means that every page load creates a new version of this attachment.

If a user is restricted from saving attachments on this page, then they won't see the chart at all, instead the error message:

{noformat}
Error rendering macro 'chart' : Export not valid. Not authorized to recreate chart-image.png from page: Page With Chart (524295)
{noformat}

As a result of this, anyone watching that page will get a notification saying the attachment was changed, every single time the page is loaded by someone with write access, even if there is no change.

h4. Steps to Reproduce

# Make sure you have an outgoing email server functioning correctly
# Create a page with a chart macro and some dummy data inside it
# Make sure the chart macro is set to save an attachment
# Make sure there is an account watching the page, other than the current user
# Reload the page, observe the notification
# Restrict editing the page from a user
# Try to load the page as that user, and see that the chart will not display

h4. Workaround

You can use one of the following workarounds to avoid the symptoms of this:

# Disable saving the attachment altogether
# Switch the versioning method from "new" to "replace" or "keep" - "replace" will still have the symptom where a user who has edit restrictions can't view the chart, but avoids the many versions being created, "keep" should fix both symptoms.
fields.summary: Chart Macro saves new version of attachment even when nothing has changed, consequently requires edit permissions to view

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-30984].
  {panel}

Steps
* insert a jira issue macro
* in the settings configure columns to be "Resolution", "Issue Type", "Summary", "Key"
* save the page and notice that the order of the column was changed
fields.summary: The order of columns defined for jira issues macro is not respected

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:
* Create a table with one row (no headers)
* Colour the fist cell red
* Colour the second cell green

Now insert a new row below it
* It will inherit the previous row colours (nice)
* But I don't want that, try to remove the colours by applying no colour and it doesn't work

Video: http://screencast.com/t/T9lF5xow

The only workaround is to recreate your table :( 

My use case was trying to do a retrospective table http://cl.ly/image/3Q3U2X3f3404
fields.summary: If you insert a new row under in a table under coloured cells, it is not possible to remove those colours

fields.description:
There are three screen shots attached to this case, before after and comparison.  What is happening is that when the exact same string is moved to another column in the same row, a comparison of these two pages results in the displacement of the farthest cell to the right.

The above may be a bit confusing as it was difficult to word, the screen shots tell the story better than I so please review them.
fields.summary: Page History Comparison of Table Changes When Moving Date to Adjacent Cell is Wrong

fields.description:
After successfully running a large number of requests, basic request fails and  following warning message appears in the logs. A server restart is required to get SOAP access working again. Similar activity against earlier Confluence versions has never experienced this problem. It is not know after how many requests before begins to fail, but I have had to restart at least twice in the last 2 hours of running various automated test using the Confluence CLI. Primary activity is storing pages.
{noformat}
2013-09-28 11:17:43,527 WARN [http-8122-6] [confluence.rpc.axis.AxisSoapServer] recycleAxisServlet Initialising AXIS SOAP service (loading)
 -- url: /rpc/soap-axis/confluenceservice-v1 | userName: anonymous
2013-09-28 11:17:43,564 WARN [http-8122-6] [confluence.rpc.axis.ConfluenceAxisServerFactory] getServer getServer
 -- url: /rpc/soap-axis/confluenceservice-v1 | userName: anonymous
{noformat}
fields.summary: SOAP access fails requiring a server restart

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-30979].
  {panel}

With the Macro "Page Properties Report" you can define which fields of the Page-Header are displayed in the report. But the ordering is random.

I want to define by which field the report should be ordered default.
(Example: I manage my Milestones with Confluence and I have a Field ID or Startdate. Now I want to have the List default ordered by ID or Startdate to have the right view when I open th page. But it orders by ?!?!?! I don't know by what it orders. Looks random)

Thanks.
fields.summary: Page Properties Report - Default column ordering/sorting
Make the  warning message to upgrade application link to be more visible to system administrators.

fields.description:
Our users of the confluence are complaining on constantly appearing exception on attempt to save data. 

-----------------------
java.lang.IllegalStateException: Post too large
at org.apache.catalina.connector.Request.parseParameters(Request.java:2368)
------------------------

By reading relevant documentation and issues in JIRA I came up to the solution that this is because of default setting of Tomcat Application server for postMaxSize (default size = 2.0MB). We are currently using 5.5 Tomcat version on production. 
As a workaround, by increasing the postMaxSize using server.xml from 2MB to 3MB we can make the exception to appear less frequently

Is there any permanent solution for this?
fields.summary: Limitation on Post size

fields.description:
multi-term search the default "OR" in Confluence 5.2.x, 5.3.x.
Please confirm the following test results.

h3. Test Results (5.3.x)

Query: Confluence Search
https://confluence.atlassian.com/dosearchsite.action?queryString=Confluence%20Search&startIndex=0&where=conf_all
  *Page 1 of 5479. Showing {color:red}54782{color} results*

Query: Confluence OR Search
https://confluence.atlassian.com/dosearchsite.action?queryString=Confluence%20OR%20Search&startIndex=0&where=conf_all
  *Page 1 of 5479. Showing {color:red}54782{color} results*

Query: Confluence AND Search
https://confluence.atlassian.com/dosearchsite.action?queryString=Confluence%20AND%20Search&startIndex=0&where=conf_all
  *Page 1 of 639. Showing 6390 results*

Query: +Confluence +Search
https://confluence.atlassian.com/dosearchsite.action?queryString=%2BConfluence%20%2BSearch&startIndex=0&where=conf_all
  *Page 1 of 639. Showing 6390 results*


h3. Confirmation
Is this specifications change?
Can this be changed by setting?
We want to make a default AND.

https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/DOC/Confluence+5.2+Release+Notes
Confluence 5.2.x versionup Lucene ver 4.3.0.
Is it the influence?

I confirm "AND search"  in Confluence version 4.x.
I think that it was the following issues.
https://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONF-5874


h5. Appendix:
QueryParser.setDefaultOperator(QueryParser.Operator.AND);
ref. http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_3_0/queryparser/org/apache/lucene/queryparser/classic/QueryParser.Operator.html
fields.summary: multi-term search the default "OR" in Confluence 5.2.x, 5.3.x.

To replicate
enable markup dialog
do not enter any text
hit save button

Tested on FF 24.

fields.description:
Some of the text in the presentation displays behind other text.
*Workaround*
The presentation will render properly if converted to PDF and then embedded.

fields.description:
[Display URL|http://confluence.atlassian.com/display/JIRA/Editing+an+Application+Link] is configured when configuring Application Link in the Confluence admin panel. This URL is used when displaying JIRA links in Confluence in the browser.

But Confluence does not use the Display URL when [inserting JIRA issue|http://confluence.atlassian.com/display/DOC/Inserting+JIRA+Issues].

This is a regression, it used to work with the old JIRA Issue Macro.

fields.description:
I have only one user "Tamra Ranard" registered.
But I get multiple entries of this user at my Confluence People Directory.
When I start typing username there are multiple "Tamra Ranard" users dropped down in an autosuggest list.
This is very annoying.
See attach.

fields.summary: An error occurs after typing "@" in the field

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:

1) Install a Confluence - tested on version 5.2.3
2) On Database URL, remove the string "jdbc:mysql://"
3) As expected the connection will not happen, however the error suggests a driver issue, instead of accusing the URL to be wrong:

The following error(s) occurred:

* Configuring the database failed. Couldn't create the database schema.
java.sql.SQLException: No suitable driver found for localhost/confluence523?sessionVariables=storage_engine%3DInnoDB
fields.summary: When editing the Database URL, a driver error appears

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-30963].
  {panel}

The current display format of a single JIRA issue is not desirable in some cases. 

Specifically, I want to include references to multiple JIRA issues on a Confluence page individually to dictate the order of the issues and possibly include the same issue multiple times in the list. 
I also want to customize what information is shown per issue, but the Display Options are only available when multiple issues are selected. 

My hope is the macro could easily identify if no display options were changed, or a URL was copied onto the page, and then display information the way it does today. It would only be the case where the user explicitly set display options that the macro would render as if there were multiple issues selected.
fields.summary: JIRA Issue macro - allow Display Options for a single issue, not just multiple
Provide a way create the cluster name from the multicast IP

fields.description:
I'm trying to delete the attachements of a page but nothing happens.

I tried several times. Besides, if I try to link the file, it doesn't work.
I see the list of files but if I try to access one of them the page is not found.

If I try to delete the file using the version (see image) the confirmation page appears but the delete button doesn't work
fields.summary: Can't delete the attachements from a page
